A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lol. People don’t know what they want with Star Wars. This was a great movie and a wonderful addition to the franchise. There’s still another part of the trilogy\, all these unanswered questions will be resolved\, and if not\, then by the canon expanded universe. Don’t be fooled by the haters who can’t let go of the past. Star Wars needed a fresh direction and now it’s has one.
